de.mrapp.android.dialog.model

Interface ListDialog

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ButtonBarDialog, ButtonBarDialogDecorator, Dialog, HeaderDialog, HeaderDialogDecorator, ListDialogDecorator, MaterialDialog, MaterialDialogDecorator, ValidateableDialog, ValidateableDialogDecorator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractListDialog, MaterialDialog

    public interface ListDialog
extends ButtonBarDialog, ListDialogDecorator
    Defines the interface, a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain list items, must implement.
    Since:
    3.2.0
